adjectives.description: transmissible (comparative more transmissible, superlative most transmissible)

entries.meaning: (medicine, of a disease) Capable of being transmitted from one person to another.
examples: Synonyms: communicable, spreadable, catching (but the last two are not interchangeable in formal registers)

entries.meaning: (radio communications or broadcasting, of a message or program) Capable of being transmitted from a transmitter to a receiver.
